title: Review quarterly marketing campaign performance
description: Analyze metrics from Q3 campaigns including email open rates, social media engagement, and conversion data. Prepare executive summary for leadership team.

title: Schedule annual health checkup
description: Call Dr. Smith's office to book routine physical exam and blood work. Also schedule dental cleaning for next month.

title: Implement user authentication system
description: Build secure login/signup flow with JWT tokens, password hashing, and email verification. Include social OAuth options for Google and LinkedIn.

title: Plan weekend hiking trip to Blue Ridge Mountains
description: Research trails, check weather forecast, pack camping gear, and coordinate with friends. Book campsite reservations and prepare trail maps.

title: Complete React certification course
description: Finish modules 8-12 covering advanced hooks, context API, and performance optimization. Take final assessment and download certificate.
